visualizationConfigs.vQuery: MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 2100 and n.kpiId=2101 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=2101 RETURN  n.Type as Type, sum(n.Count) as Count

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 2100 and n.kpiId=2102 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=2102 and n.StoryTypes in ['PaymentServices','MobileServices','ClaimFinder','AgentLocator'] with n return distinct n.StoryTypes as StoryTypes ,toInt(ROUND(Avg(n.Duration))) as Duration

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 2100 and n.kpiId=2103 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=2103 RETURN  apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date, n.Productivity as Productivity ORDER BY Date DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 2100 and n.kpiId=2104 RETURN  apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date , n.Bugs as Bugs,n.Vulnerablilities as Vulnerablilities,n.CodeSmell as CodeSmell ORDER BY n.executionId DESC limit 2

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 2100 and n.kpiId=2105 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=2105 RETURN   apoc.date.format( n.recordDate ,'s','MM/dd') as Date , n.Failure as Failure,n.Success as Success ORDER BY Date DESC

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 2100 and n.kpiId=2106 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=2106 RETURN  n.resultField as Deploy , n.Deploy as Value

MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.reportId = 2100 and n.kpiId=2107 with MAX(n.executionId) as latestExecutionId MATCH (n:KPI:RESULTS) where n.executionId=latestExecutionId and n.kpiId=2107 RETURN  n.resultField as Builds, n.Builds as Value
